text: area Thompson and I'm 91 years old and
I'm running the marathon at San Diego
for the 15th time I started running
because I had friends who were very ill
from leukemia and a friend of mine was
gathering money for the race said she
was going to run for the Leukemia and
Lymphoma Society and I decided well I
think I should walk that so I signed up
and I came out here 1999 I ran my first
marathon my favorite parts at the end
when I get over that finish line that's
